headline: Marriott's New Brand Could Please Value Travelers—But Maybe Not the Status-Obsessed
summary: Marriott International tells prospective guests at its new StudioRes brand to "unpack your bags and get comfortable." It just won't offer its loyalty members elite nights for staying there.
